name: Classroom - 3 (2)
description: Supporting a Youth in Crisis - Room 1 - Teacher asking to open textbook
hints: It seems that this class requires a textbook, and everyone has one on their desk.
Hmm... what's that on Skylar's desk? That doesn't look like the textbook.
Perhaps I should offer to share my textbook with Skylar? I am sure sharing my textbook would be appreciated...

In order to solve this room, you need to share your textbook with Skylar. When you click on Skylar's agenda, you can drag the puzzle pieces to indicate that you would share the textbook with Skylar. This would mean putting the images in following order: textbook, right arrow, Skylar.
